data.title: Bed and Breakfast County Down

data.meta_description: Bed and breakfast accommodation in County Down is available to book on B&B Ireland. Book a B&B in Down Northern Ireland online and get instant confirmation and no booking fees
data.text:
Down St Patrick's County

Search for B&B Accommodation in County Down

Home to former World Golf Number one Rory McIlroy, County Down is located to the east of Northern Ireland and is made up of beautiful rugged mountains and hills, the most famous being the spectacular Mourne Mountains. County Down and its rolling hills is the ideal location for any hill walking or golf enthusiasts.

Coastline

To the East of the county is Downâ€™s superb coastline and the popular Strangford Lough. Both destinations are magnets for fishing, sailing and watersports fans.

North Down Coastal Path extends 16 miles and passes through coastline and parkland. En route, walkers will discover the many historic relics, flora and fauna and grey seals which can be spotted offshore.

History and Heritage

County Down is steeped in history and heritage. There are plenty of archaeological sites and ancient ruins throughout the County. The Ulster Folk Park, Hillsborough Castle and Mount Stewart House and Gardens are a must for any historical enthusiast.

There is an abundance of bed and breakfasts in County Down and along the beautiful coast. Each bed and breakfast is unique but all provide that warm Irish welcome and hospitality. Be sure to choose a B&B for your next trip to Ireland.
